price: 12.Tokkel malciná qaraanih gindk namma ayrdh addat gabá kaleeh, kulli qaraanal-le amri oobise. Kaadu Addunyâ qaran ifa cutuukut bilqisne kaadu sheetoona qaraanak yab ankacissaah yab garaqtaamak dacayri tet (cutuk kinnuk) abne, woo ginóy qaxmeqe mayso-leeh ixxiga-le Rabbih caggudusiyyaa kee dudda kinni.
arabic: فَقَضَىٰهُنَّ سَبۡعَ سَمَٰوَاتٖ فِي يَوۡمَيۡنِ وَأَوۡحَىٰ فِي كُلِّ سَمَآءٍ أَمۡرَهَاۚ وَزَيَّنَّا ٱلسَّمَآءَ ٱلدُّنۡيَا بِمَصَٰبِيحَ وَحِفۡظٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ تَقۡدِيرُ ٱلۡعَزِيزِ ٱلۡعَلِيمِ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: faqaḍāhunna sabʿa samāwātin fī yawmayni wa-awḥā fī kulli samāin amrahā wazayyannā al-samāa al-dun'yā bimaṣābīḥa waḥif'ẓan dhālika taqdīru al-ʿazīzi al-ʿalīmi
